content: कलहः, --हं [कलं कामं हंति हण्-ड <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Strife, quarrel: ईर्ष्याकलहः <ls>Bh. 1. 2</ls>; लीला° <ls>Ś. Til. 8</ls>; so शुष्ककलहः, प्रणयकलहः &c. {@--2@} War, battle. {@--3@} Trick, deceit, falsehood. {@--4@} Violence, kicking, beating &c; <ls>Ms. 4. 121</ls>; (where Medhātithi and Kullūka explain कलह by दडादिनेतरेतरताडनं and दंडादंड्यादि respectively). {@--5@} A road, way. {@--6@} The sheath of a sword. {@--7@} A cry, sound; <ls>Māl. 9. 18.</ls>
